# Pagination Item

## Usage:

```html
<p-pagination-item>#</p-pagination-item>
```

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                          | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Wether the pagination item is active | `boolean` | `false` |
